     df = df.dropna(subset=['value'])  # assume 'value' is critical column
     df['amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['amount'], errors='coerce')
     summary = df.groupby('category').agg({'amount': ['mean', 'sum'], 'count': 'count'})
     summary.to_csv('summary.csv', index=True)
